message: Let's start fair. I take 90% and you get 10%. We can discuss it further if you like.
I'll give you a bigger share, but I think 60/40 is a more reasonable split. Let's discuss further if needed.

I understand your point about a more even split, but I'm still not happy with 60/40.  I'm willing to negotiate a little closer to your offer, but 7200/2800 is my best offer.  Let's see if we can agree.
I'm willing to compromise further. 55/45 is a more reasonable split, considering the value of the money is decreasing. Let's see if we can agree on this one.
